about_the_game:
Extra-game content for [Witch Spring 3 Re:Fine　] The set includes a soundtrack with 30 tracks and an 80-page art book.

The artbook is in Japanese.
detailed_description:
Extra-game content for [Witch Spring 3 Re:Fine　] The set includes a soundtrack with 30 tracks and an 80-page art book.

The artbook is in Japanese.

fullgame.name: WitchSpring3 Re:Fine - The Story of Eirudy -

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-6400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 120 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: The artbook requires equipment that can open PDF files. The soundtrack requires equipment that can play mp3 files.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-9700
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

short_description: Extra-game content for [Witch Spring 3 Re:Fine　] The set includes a soundtrack with 30 tracks and an 80-page art book.
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Korean*
*languages with full audio support
